guide:
# LitRPG Canon Guide

## Characters
One file per named character. Include:
- Personality and voice (this is still a story, not a stat sheet)
- Class, level, key stats
- Notable abilities and skills
- Inventory highlights (link to items canon for details)
- Arc and growth trajectory

## Locations
One file per significant area. Include:
- Physical description and atmosphere
- Level range and difficulty
- Notable monsters or NPCs
- Loot tables or resources (if relevant)

## Systems
One file per game mechanic. Include:
- How it works — rules, formulas if needed
- Edge cases and limitations
- How characters interact with it
- Keep it consistent — readers will check your math

## Factions
One file per guild, party, or organization. Include:
- Members, leadership, ranking system
- Territory and resources
- Goals and rivalries

## Items
One file per significant item or item category. Include:
- Stats and effects
- Rarity and how it was obtained
- Who currently has it
- Narrative significance beyond stats
